name: It's Alive! ...Keep it That Way
description:
Keep Frankenstein's monster alive while you perform surgery on most/all of his organs. Then do it again, but faster.

A reverse Operation game.

Tap or click on the organs to drag them through Frankenstein's monster's body, but don't let them touch anything that hurts. You may need to grab the organ again if you bonk it. Click to skip the first cutscene!

There's an easter egg for you if you can finish without losing any health :)

Made for Ludum Dare 46. I used GameMaker, Aseprite, and Famitracker.

Check out xygthop3's CRT shader: https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/701/crt-pixel-shader
